item.title: OLRA
item.description:
OLRA stands for OWASP LLM Risk Allocation.

The OWASP LLM top 10 risks are a good start for analyzing the risks of an LLM system.

But, who is supposed to do each control?

This is where risk allocation comes in.

We identify the following roles, based on the CSA AICM.

AI Customer (AIC)

End users of AI applications. This includes the actual users as well as their organisational units.

Application Provider (AP)

These providers build and offer end-user applications that leverage generative AI models for specific tasks such as content creation, chatbots, code generation, and enterprise automation.
